title: WATCH: Tottenham 1-1 West Ham highlights
description: Heung-Min Son and Pedro Obiang each scored a stunner as Tottenham were held by West Ham to a 1-1 draw at Wembley.
content: Spurs had hit 20 shots by the time the Hammers took the lead with their first as Obiang beat Hugo Lloris with a blistering 70th-minute effort from 30 yards.Son replied with his own spectacular long-range strike six minutes from time but Tottenham were unable to find a winner on another frustrating night for Mauricio Pochettino's side at the national stadium.Hit the video at the top of the story for the best of the action from a thrilling London derby...
